ENNUI ~ Elegant Neural Network User Interface ~

Ennui help people learn about deep learning by building, training, and visualizing deep neural networks on the browser. It has an easy to use drag-and-drop interface. When you're ready to start coding you can export the code to produce you network to Python or Julia!
